tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE government_contracts (
contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
contractor_name VARCHAR(255),
contract_amount DECIMAL(12,2),
contract_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE government_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_title VARCHAR(255),
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE procurement_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    amount_spent DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES government_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProcurementRecords (
   record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   contract_id UUID,
   agency_id UUID,
   procurement_date DATE,
   procurement_amount FLOAT,
   FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES GovernmentContracts(contract_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES GovernmentAgencies(agency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_number INT NOT NULL,
    contractor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contract_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE contracts_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    action_taken VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    action_date DATE NOT NULL,
    notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE government_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contractor_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE procurement_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    date_of_purchase DATE,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    employee_role VARCHAR(255),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE contract_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(255),
    state VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_documents (
    document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    document_type VARCHAR(50),
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_path VARCHAR(255)
);
